dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So, 624 people convicted of corruption are completely excluded from this amnesty, huh? That's a pretty significant number.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, six hundred twenty four people convicted of corruption are completely excluded from this amnesty, huh? That's a pretty significant number.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: These include corruption-related crimes " we have 624 people convicted under these.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and that's just one category. Deputy Kuspan made it clear—corruption, terrorism, extremism, torture—none of those are getting amnestied.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and that's just one category. Deputy Kuspan made it clear-corruption, terrorism, extremism, torture-none of those are getting amnestied.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I can only list the following categories of criminal cases that are not subject to amnesty. These include corruption-related crimes " we have 624 people convicted under these. Terrorism-related crimes " 294 convicted. Extremist-related offenses " 96 individuals. Torture " 48 individuals.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But it's the amnesty is for an indefinite group—doesn't that leave a lot of room for interpretation?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But it's the amnesty is for an indefinite group-doesn't that leave a lot of room for interpretation?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In particular, he listed the categories of convicted individuals who will definitely not be affected by the amnesty, noting that the Parliament adopted the law in relation to an indefinite group of people.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Well, he did specify repeat offenders too, so it's not like they're being vague across the board. They're drawing some hard lines.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, he did specify repeat offenders too, so it's not like they're being vague across the board. They're drawing some hard lines.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In addition, the amnesty does not apply to those who have committed repeat offenses, Kuspan stated at the briefing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Still, 294 for terrorism? That feels like a lot of people staying behind bars.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still, two hundred ninety four for terrorism? That feels like a lot of people staying behind bars.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, you can see why they'd exclude those categories, right? Especially with the amnesty tied to the 30th anniversary of the Constitution—they want it to feel meaningful but not reckless.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, you can see why they'd exclude those categories, right? Especially with the amnesty tied to the thirtieth anniversary of the Constitution-they want it to feel meaningful but not reckless.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, Mazhilis deputies passed the law "On Amnesty in Connection with the 30th Anniversary of the Constitution of the Republic of Kazakhstan."

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: What about someone like Kuandyk Bishimbayev? He's a high-profile case—was he mentioned?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What about someone like Kuandyk Bishimbayev? He's a high-profile case-was he mentioned?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Not by name, but given his corruption conviction, he definitely falls into one of those excluded groups. No surprise there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Not by name, but given his corruption conviction, he definitely falls into one of those excluded groups. No surprise there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We cannot name specific surnames or first names here. Read also: Ex-minister Kuandyk Bishimbayev not eligible for amnesty

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Do you think this amnesty will actually have much impact, then? With all these carve-outs?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Do you think this amnesty will actually have much impact, then? With all these carve-outs?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, for sure—it's not blanket, but there are still plenty of non-violent or first-time offenders who might benefit. It's about balance.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, for sure-it's not blanket, but there are still plenty of non-violent or first-time offenders who might benefit. It's about balance.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Hmm, I guess we'll have to wait for the final numbers to see how many people actually qualify.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hmm, I guess we'll have to wait for the final numbers to see how many people actually qualify.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. But Kuspan's breakdown at least gives us a clearer picture of who definitely won't be included.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. But Kuspan's breakdown at least gives us a clearer picture of who definitely won't be included.
